column4: I've connected a Sansa via USB. How do I gain access to it now? Why isn't it automounted? (Or is it?)
I've connected a Sansa via USB. How do I gain access to it now? Why isn't it automounted? (Or is it?)
perhaps check dmesg for interesting messages right after plugging it in
some mp3 players show up as standard usb mass storage, which should automount by default. I don't know if yours is one of those.
